data.comment: The match has started at Allianz Field.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 3, Robert Sibiga signals a Dallas throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Dallas to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Minnesota have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Throw-in for Dallas at Allianz Field.
Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.

Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Dallas will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Minnesota.

Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Robert Sibiga signals a throw-in for Minnesota, close to Dallas's area.
Goal kick for Dallas at Allianz Field.
In the minute 17, Kevin Molino puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Emanuel Reynoso instrumental with a fine assist.
Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.

In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Dallas's Bryan Reynolds has been booked in Saint Paul.
The second half has started at Allianz Field.
Great finish from Emanuel Reynoso to give Minnesota a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 47, Great play from Robin Lod to set up the goal.
Dallas to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Robert Sibiga signals a Dallas throw-in in Minnesota's half.

Dallas make their first substitution with Fafa Picault replacing Harold Mosquera.

Throw-in for Dallas close to the penalty box.

In the minute 85, Chase Gasper is replacing Emanuel Reynoso for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
The home team have replaced Romain Metanire with Noah Billingsley. This is the fourth substitution made today by Adrian Heath.
Minnesota make their fifth substitution with James Musa replacing Marlon Hairston.
